The Pfizer Vaccine Body Count - Index of Articles on Deaths and Serious Neurological Dysfunction Following COVID Vaccinations

[ Editor's Note : There is a very large percentage of people in the USA who have no understanding whatsoever of the immense - and irreversible - dangers involved in taking the Covid 'vaccine.' which is not really a vaccine at all, but rather a DNA-altering, genetic modification substance . Once injected with this life-destroying substance, you will never be able to mitigate or reverse the genetic alterations it will induce in your body . It is not a vaccine as you've been accustomed to hearing of for all your life. It''s a means of enslavement and permanent virtual connection to AI computers that will henceforth monitor, track, record, and influence/control your body and your mind (conscious and subconscious) and your thoughts in a way that you never dreamed possible. It's the worst mistake you could possible make in lifetime. Millions of people will experience an early painful death before the insanity of this genocidal vaccination juggernaut comes to a halt after enough family members, friends and neighbors start dropping like flies as each week of this international, worldwide poisoning campaign rolls on. Life is a beautiful thing when your body and your spirit are YOURS to control and protect. Don't give it away to these Satanic Psychopaths. These articles are hardly the tip of the iceberg in accounting for how many have already died and how many wil l die after getting their 'safe & effective" vaccine.]
